sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import ProfileService from "./ProfileService"; class Profile extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.service = new ProfileService(); } componentDidMount() { this.service.getProfile() .then((response) => { this.setState({ _id: response._id, username: response.username, email: response.email, dateOfBirth: response.dateOfBirth, address: response.address, city: response.city, contactname: response.contactname, relationshipcontact: response.relationshipcontact, contactphone: response.contactphone, bloodGroup: response.bloodGroup, allergies: response.allergies, diagnosis: response.diagnosis, drug: response.drug, administration: response.administration, ambulance: response.ambulance, additionalInfo: response.additionalInfo, }) }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } handleChange = (event) => { const {name, value} = event.target; this.setState({ [name]: value}); } updateProfile = () => { this.service.updateProfile(this.state.name, this.state.email, this.state.dateOfBirth, this.state.address, this.state.city, this.state.contactname, this.state.relationshipcontact, this.state.contactname, this.state.relationshipcontact, this.state.contactphone, this.state.bloodGroup, this.state.allergies, this.state.diagnosis, this.state.drug, this.state.administration, this.state.ambulance, this.state.additionalInfo) } render() { return this.state ? (

{this.state.username} profile info

This is the info that your NFC card will show.

Anything to update? (Click here!)

Your personal info:

  1. Name: {this.state.username}
  2. email: {this.state.email}
  3. Date of birth: {this.state.dateOfBirth}
  4. Address: {this.state.address}
  5. City: {this.state.city}

Your emergency contact:

  1. Name: {this.state.contactname}
  2. is your... {this.state.relationshipcontact}
  3. Phone: {this.state.contactphone}

Your medical info:

  1. Blood group: {this.state.bloodGroup}
  2. Allergies: {this.state.allergies}
  3. Disease: {this.state.diagnosis}

Your treatment info:

  1. I need this medication: {this.state.drug}
  2. It must be administered in this way: {this.state.administration}
  3. I need an ambulance: {this.state.ambulance}
  4. Additional info: {this.state.additionalInfo}
See how others will see your profile

) : 'Loading...' } } export default Profile;
